title: Update is freezes computer
body: So I had a break from LoL for 2 months and now I trying to update the Client but it dosen't metter at what percentage it is my PC freez and it's not responding and then I have to restart it. I try run it as administrator but there are no results and doing the thing with compatibility mode and run this program in compatibility mode for windows 7.

replies.body: If your pc is freezing up when League is trying to patch there might be something going wrong with how your pc is writing to the disk. Let's go ahead and get you some one on one help from our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make sure you get this looked at properly!
